name: Rock, Paper, Scissors Royale
description:
Witness the epic battle between the mortal enemies: Rock, Paper and Scissors. Or become a part of it!

This is a little game inspired by a famous TikTok video which shows a simulation of rock, paper and scissors battle. You can watch a similar simulation, or you can choose to control a randomly assigned soldier of a certain side.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow controls the soldier in game mode

 X key randomly changes the soldier you control (south button is used for this in gamepad, which is A button in XBox controller).

Why did I make this little game?

This is a hobby project I worked on in order to get rid of the dev's block.
